page.title: 10LEISURE
page.content:
{ LEISURE}
RELAXING AT HOME
Most people spend there time relaxing at home.They make their own entertainment.Video machines are very popular and people join video clubs to rent out films.Television offers four different channels to choose from. People between the ages of 50 upwards spend most of their time at home.In this area our survey showed 32 people spent their spare time at home.
GARDENING
Gardening is also a popular way of using their leisure time. Guernsey people take great pride in their gardens. The odours coming from the gardens are very beautiful.
